special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense.
descriptions: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Movement.
descriptions: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 10 feet (included in its speed).

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The monk makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Parry.
descriptions: The monk adds 2 to its AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the monk must see the attacker.
